verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* for \w help|strong="H5833"\w*; and \w stay|strong="H8172"\w* on \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, because \add they are\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*; and in \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, because they are \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w strong|strong="H6105"\w*; but they \w look|strong="H8159"\w* not unto the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, neither \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*!

Yet he also \add is\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, and will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and will not call \w back|strong="H5493"\w* his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: but will \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w*, and against the \w help|strong="H5833"\w* of them that \w work|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.\f + \fr 31.2 \ft call…: Heb. remove\f*

Now the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \add are\add* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, and not \w God|strong="H0410"\w*; and their \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and not \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*. When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, both he that \w helpeth|strong="H5826"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*, and he that is \w holpen|strong="H5826"\w* shall fall \w down|strong="H5307"\w*, and they all shall \w fail|strong="H3615"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

For thus hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Like as the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* and the young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* \w roaring|strong="H1897"\w* on his \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, when a \w multitude|strong="H4393"\w* of \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* is called \w forth|strong="H7121"\w* against him, \add he\add* will not be \w afraid|strong="H2865"\w* of their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, nor \w abase|strong="H6031"\w* himself for the \w noise|strong="H1995"\w* of them: so shall the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w fight|strong="H6633"\w* for \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and for the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* thereof.  +  r 31.4  t noise: or, multitude *

As \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* \w flying|strong="H5774"\w*, so will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w defend|strong="H1598"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w defending|strong="H1598"\w* also he will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \add it; and\add* passing \w over|strong="H6452"\w* he will \w preserve|strong="H4422"\w* it.
¶ \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye unto \add him from\add* whom the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have \w deeply|strong="H6009"\w* \w revolted|strong="H5627"\w*.

For in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall cast \w away|strong="H3988"\w* his \w idols|strong="H0457"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and his \w idols|strong="H0457"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, which your own \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* unto you \add for\add* a \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.\f + \fr 31.7 \ft his idols of gold: Heb. the idols of his gold\f*

¶ Then shall the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, not of a mighty \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; and the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, not of a mean \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* him: but he shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and his young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* shall be \w discomfited|strong="H4522"\w*.\f + \fr 31.8 \ft from: or, for fear of\f*\f + \fr 31.8 \ft discomfited: or, tributary: Heb. for melting, or, tribute\f*

And he shall pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to his strong \w hold|strong="H5553"\w* for \w fear|strong="H4032"\w*, and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* shall be \w afraid|strong="H2865"\w* of the \w ensign|strong="H5251"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, whose \w fire|strong="H0217"\w* \add is\add* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and his \w furnace|strong="H8574"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 31.9 \ft he…: Heb. his rock shall pass away for fear\f*\f + \fr 31.9 \ft his strong hold: or, his strength\f*
